docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, Aug. 9 (AP)-- The Senate today ratified a treaty with Canada under which the two nations agree on mutual use of the waters of the Niagara River.

docs.snippet: BUENOS AIRES, Aug. 16-- Federico Chaves, who less than two years ago was here as a disregarded political exile, returned this morning as President of Paraguay and as President Juan Peron's special guest at the San Martin centenary observance.
docs.lead_paragraph: BUENOS AIRES, Aug. 16-- Federico Chaves, who less than two years ago was here as a disregarded political exile, returned this morning as President of Paraguay and as President Juan Peron's special guest at the San Martin centenary observance.
